title: Farm

owner_ID.title: Owner-ID
owner_ID.description: ID of the owner as used by the datacollecting organisation

farmerInternalID.title: Internal Farmer ID
farmerInternalID.description: Internal dataset ID for the farmer in the dataset

farmBoundary.title: Farm Boundary
farmBoundary.description: All the land belonging to (and not necessarily owned by) farm

farmArea.title: Farm Area

stockofProduce.title: Stock of Produce
